Portfolio.name: Training Log
Portfolio.description: A python application made to keep a log of training workouts. Example data will be shown in December 2023.
Portfolio.largeDescription: Made using tkinter gui and its calander import. Calander.py takes data from dates.py, which is the file that contains all the workout data, the displays the data in a calander for each date that data is available. If data is available then the corresponding date is also marked as green.

Portfolio.name: Python Daily.Dev Problems
Portfolio.description: Completing code problems using the pyhton language from the website: --daily.dev website link--
Portfolio.largeDescription: This website contains multiple projects of various difficulties. This is a project for my own personal practice where I will start from the easiest and work my way through. Some problem descriptions on the site includes example code, this will be ignored when working on these problems.
